Keyboard Shortcuts
==================

Keyboard shortcuts for the module viewer, and anywhere else you can edit code. These are listed in the CodeMirror
documentation. The include the `standard keymap <https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#commands.standardKeymap>`__,
`default keymap <https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#commands.defaultKeymap>`__ ,
`history keymap <https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#commands.historyKeymap>`__ ,
`fold keymap <https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#commands.foldKeymap>`__ ,
and `completion keymap <https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#commands.completionKeymap>`__ ,
